1.SceneDescription: Central Perk, Joey is talking to Ross

lines.Line:
There’s this woman, that I like.  A lot.  Well, it’s
complicated.  She’s with this other guy.  For a long time.  And I
could never do that to the guy, y’know?  ’Ccause we’re really good
friends
So, uh, this guy, she used to go out with, is, uh… is he a good guy
Then talk to him! He might be fine with it
Then talk to him! He might be fine with it
Joey, it’s worth finding out. I mean, if you really like her

I do! So much! I can’t stop thinking about her! I can’t sleep,
I

Okay, Joey, you know what? You have to go for it. How often does this happen
to you, huh? You owe it to yourself. (Walks towards the door until…

lines.Character: [Fade to Black, then fade in again with Ross stopped at the doorway
lines.Line: Fade to Black, then fade in again with Ross stopped at the doorway.

it’s Rachel

(startled) Yeah, okay but look, buy uh—Hey-hey, y’know,
y’know who else I like? You! And it-it doesn’t get said enough. I like you Ross
Yeah, but it’s not a big deal

It’s not a big deal? Oh, I’m sorry I just…um, I…what
about all the stuff you-you just said? I mean how about, I like—you-you can’t
stop thinking about her. Like how you can’t sleep

I’m an actor, y’know? As-as a group, we tend to be over
dramatic
Rachel who’s carrying my baby? Rachel
Rachel who’s carrying my baby? Rachel
Rachel who’s carrying my baby? Rachel

Look no, I-I know it’s bad, and I know it’s wrong. Okay? But-but
it’s not like anything’s ever gonna happen. Y’know? These-these are just
feelings, they’re gonna go away
Y’know what? I-I gotta go. (Starts to leave.
Oh come on Ross! Hey Ross-Ross don’t
Oh come on Ross! Hey Ross-Ross don’t

lines.Character: (He exits and starts to walk away, passes a window, stops, and says
again. Joey sighs and turns around to face Gunther
lines.Line:
He exits and starts to walk away, passes a window, stops, and says
"Rachel?!" again. Joey sighs and turns around to face Gunther.

lines.Line: I just talked to Joey, I just—I want to see how you were

but don’t say that again

stepfather of my child

First of all he’s-he’s never gonna tell her how he feels about her. And even if

Sure, because women never like Joey. Y’know, I think he’s a
virgin

Sure, because women never like Joey. Y’know, I think he’s a

Joey…he’s not even thinking about going after Rachel

listen it’s totally freaking him out. He’s talking about moving to Vermont
He says he wants to leave the country. (Pause) He thinks you hate him

Hate him? I… No, I don’t hate him. (Pause) It’s just

Honey I can’t even imagine how hard this must be for you. But, I

3.SceneDescription:
Joey’s Apartment, there’s a knock on the door and Joey answers it to
Ross.

lines.Line: Look, I understand if you came by to hit me, I deserve it
No, I don’t want to hit you
No, I don’t want to hit you

No, no I don’t want to do anything to you. All right? I just want to
tell you that I’m not mad at you and…and that I certainly do not hate you. I
just, I just came here to say that. (Starts to leave.

Oh now—Hey Ross-Ross! Do you wanna-wanna come in for a beer or
something

Do uh, do you got any beer? All-all I got is this melon stuff that Rachel
left. I don’t

(pouring two glasses) Hey look Ross, you need to understand something
okay? I uh…I am never gonna act on this Rachel thing, okay? I-I would never do
anything to jeopardize my friendship with you. (He hands Ross a glass.

lines.Character:
(They clink glasses and take a drink. Ross likes it, Joey hates it. Then Ross sees Joey
hating it, mimics he hates it as well
lines.Line:
They clink glasses and take a drink. Ross likes it, Joey hates it. Then Ross sees Joey
hating it, mimics he hates it as well.

Anyway, it uh…look it’ll just…take me a while to get over

What?! You’re in love with her
Yeah, I thought you knew that
Yeah, I thought you knew that

Wow. Hey look, if it helps, I don’t want to feel this way. Honest. I

What do I do
I think you need to tell her how you feel
Okay that’s the green stuff talkin’

No, I’m serious. You-you need to find out where she is, because if

But what if uh—and I’m not saying she will be—But
But what if uh—and I’m not saying she will be—But

If she is where you are then uh…then my feeling weird about it

Yeah. Look if-if she’s gonna end up with somebody else, the truth is

So when do you think you’re gonna talk to her

Oh my God I have to tell her! I haven’t even thought about what I

I’m understanding, but let’s not get carried away
I’m understanding, but let’s not get carried away

sip of the green stuff and recoils at the taste.) Oh

Yeah, tell me about it. (He stands up, turns his back to Joey, and enjoys

4.SceneDescription: Outside Ross and Rachel's, Joey walks up to knock on the door, but stops.

lines.Line:
Okay. Okay, I can do this. I can tell her how I feel. Just uh, just stand
up straight. (Does so.) Take a couple deep breaths. (Does so.) Look confident. (Does so as
Rachel opens the door and startles him.
I uh, I just came by because I-I want to talk to you about something
Here? In the hall? What are we animals
Well honey, I’m late for a meeting. So can you just make it quick

Okay umm, I just came by to tell you that I…want to have dinner with
you tonight. That’s all

Sure! That sounds great! Just leave me a message and tell me where to
meet you. Okay? (Walks away.

Okay. That’s good. Okay, that give you a couple hours to prepare what
you’re gonna say. Good. Yeah. (Someone comes out of his apartment and it startles

you gotta say something
